name: Putin kills: Coronavirus
description:
Description:


The end of 2019. A new COVID-19 virus has appeared on the planet Earth. No one attaches much importance to it and it easily takes over the planet. The whole world is in a panic, no one knows what to do. All the world powers are asking for help from the only person who has never been ill...
He knows judo and was able to ride a bear, does not like to wear t-shirts and forgot what it is to grow old. His name is Putin, but they only call him in extreme cases, but this is just such a case...
Putin decided to personally check the virus and went to the main hospital in Moscow. It turned out that the chief doctor, with whom Vladimir Putin personally communicated, had a disease. Urgently had to test Putin for the virus, made a test and the world was horrified...
The test was confirmed: BIGCOCK-19. Now even the coronavirus is afraid of Putin! He went down to the laboratory where the virus was created and decided to deal with the evil personally!

You will have to personally get out of the presidential catacombs, then defeat the coronavirus with your bare hands and save the planet!

At the moment, the game contains 10 difficult levels, each of which is a maze. In addition to the maze, you will have to resist the virus (visible and invisible). To get to the next level, you need to find a cure. Then you can open a passage to a new level. Features:
- A unique story;

- Old-school design;

- The atmosphere of the 90's;

- Unique musical accompaniment on each level;

- Save the world from an insidious virus;

- Become the latest superhero!
